name: Ultra Menu Remove
author: Uzzal Mondal

sections.description:
Ultra Menu Remove plugin is awesome , easy to remove admin menu page . It can be used for demo site display where user can not aceess to option.

Some Features

  1. Remove dashbord
  2. Remove Jetpack.
  3. Remove Posts
  4. Remove Media
  5. Remove Pages
  6. Remove Comments
  7. Remove Appearance
  8. Remove Users
  9. Remove Tools
    10.Remove Settings
  10. 100% User friendly
  11. All Browser Supported

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6.1 or greater
  • PHP version 5.3.7 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘ultra menu remove’
  3. Activate ultra menu remove from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download ultra menu remove.
  2. Upload the ‘Ultra Menu Remove’ directory to your ‘wp-content/plugins/ultra-menu-remove.zip’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate ultra menu remove from your Plugins page.
